titleStmt.title: A true account and declaration of the horrid conspiracy against the late King, his present Majesty, and the government as it was order'd to be published by His late Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Sprat, Thomas, 1635-1713.

titleStmt.title: A true account and declaration of the horrid conspiracy against the late King, his present Majesty, and the government as it was order'd to be published by His late Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Sprat, Thomas, 1635-1713.
Oliver, John, 1616-1701, engraver.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)

publicationStmt.publisher: In the Savoy: printed by Thomas Newcomb, one of His Majesties printers,

notesStmt.note: First leaf = order to print, dated 23 May 1685.
Engraved plans of Rye House signed: I. Oliver sculp.
Caption title on p. 1 reads: A true account of the horrid conspiracy against the late King, His present Majesty, and the government.
Imperfect; title page has heavy MS. notation; text incomplete, ends on p. 219.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
